member.summary: Gets or sets the WSUS state server.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [enable group settings].
member.value: true if [enable group settings]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.ComputergroupName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the computergroup.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.DetectionFrequencyEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating that the [auto update detection] interval is enabled or not. Range = 0|1 1 = Enable detection frequency. 0 = Disable custom detection frequency (use default value of 22 hours).

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.DetectionFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the DetectionFrequency interval. Range = n, where n = time in hours (1–22). Time between detection cycles.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.RebootRelaunchTimeoutEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [reboot delay enabled]. Range = 0|1 1 = Enable RebootRelaunchTimeout. 0 = Disable custom RebootRelaunchTimeout(use default value of 10 minutes).

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.RebootRelaunchTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the reboot delay time in minutes. Range = n, where n = time in minutes (1–1,440). Time between prompts for a scheduled restart.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.RebootWarningTimeoutEnabled
member.summary: Range = 0|1 1 = Enable RebootWarningTimeout. 0 = Disable custom RebootWarningTimeout (use default value of 5 minutes).

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.RebootWarningTimeout
member.summary: Range = n, where n = time in minutes (1–30). Length, in minutes, of the restart warning countdown after updates have been installed that have a deadline or scheduled updates

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.RescheduleWaitTimeEnabled
member.summary: Range = n, where n = time in minutes (1–60). Time in minutes that Automatic Updates waits at startup before it applies updates from a missed scheduled installation time. This policy applies only to scheduled installations, not to deadlines. Updates with deadlines that have expired should always be installed as soon as possible.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.RescheduleWaitTime
member.summary: Range = n, where n = time in minutes (1–60). Time in minutes that Automatic Updates waits at startup before it applies updates from a missed scheduled installation time. This policy applies only to scheduled installations, not to deadlines. Updates with deadlines that have expired should always be installed as soon as possible.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.AutoInstallMinorUpdates
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [auto install minor updates].
member.value: true if [auto install minor updates]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.AllowRebootIfUserLoggedOn
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [allow reboot if user logged on].
member.value: true if [allow reboot if user logged on]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.AllowNonAdminInstall
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [allow non admin install].
member.value: true if [allow non admin install]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.ScheduledInstallTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the scheduled install time.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.ScheduledInstallDay
member.summary: Gets or sets the scheduled install day.
member.remarks: 0|1|2|3|4|5|6|7 0 = täglich 1-7 = Nummer des Wochentags beginnend bei Sonntag

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.DisableWindowsUpdateAccess
member.summary: Disables or enables access to Windows Update. Range = 1|0 1 = Disables access to Windows Update. 0 = Enables access to Windows Update.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.AcceptTrustedPublisherCerts
member.summary: Enables or disables WSUS Server to distribute available signed non-Microsoft updates. Range = 1|0 1 = Enabled. The WSUS server distributes available signed non-Microsoft updates. 0 = Disabled. The WSUS server does not distribute available signed non-Microsoft updates.

member.name: P:Codeplex.DBedarf.WSUS.Workgroup.ClientSettingManager.WSUSSettingManager.AUOptions
member.summary: Defines the behavior of Windows Automatic Update Range = 2|3|4|5 2 = Notify before download. 3 = Automatically download and notify of installation. 4 = Automatically download and schedule installation. Only valid if values exist for ScheduledInstallDay and ScheduledInstallTime. 5 = Automatic Updates is required and users can configure it.
